data.name: Build and Drive Racing Demo
data.description:
Welcome to the demo page of Build and Drive Racing, an exciting early access game.

Take this opportunity to try out the DEMO game and get a taste of the thrilling racing experience. If you enjoy it, don't miss out on purchasing the early access game at its launch price:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/9933061533378254/

The game is just getting started, and as the very first early access version, you can expect regular updates and improvements to enhance your gameplay.

Experience the following features in the early access game:

-Challenge unlock system: complete challenges to unlock cars, wheels, levels
-Game modes: race against your ghost and beat your best lap or race against AI opponents
-Garage: customize your car

Exciting updates are on the horizon, including:

-UX improvements
-New level and challenges
-New cars and addons
-New game modes

Get ready for an immersive racing experience and stay tuned for more thrilling updates!

We need your feedback to make this game absolute fire for you! Your thoughts and opinions matter, so don't hold back. Hit us up with those epic reviews, whether it's here, on Reddit, or on Discord. 
We wanna know what you think, 'cause you're the boss ;-) 
Help us level up this game and let's create something legendary together.
